titles.title: A bill granting the consent and approval of Congress to an interstate forest fire protection compact.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Ms. Lofgren, Zoe moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules. (consideration: CR 7/31/2007 H8917-8919)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 975.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR 7/31/2007 H8917-8918)

bill.summary: 8/13/2007--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Grants the consent and approval of Congress to the interstate forest fire protection compact for the Great Plains region of the United States set forth in this Act.
